mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: The Machine Vision and Optical Sensor (MVOS) Lab at South Dakota State University is dedicated to advancing precision agriculture through innovative research and technology development. Located within the Department of Agricultural & Biosystems Engineering, our lab serves as a hub for interdisciplinary collaboration. We are committed to improving food safety, security, and sustainability by empowering farmers with cutting-edge tools and knowledge for data-driven agricultural decisions.
